start_date.name: start_date
start_date.description: Select the start date of the simulation

end_date.name: end_date
end_date.description: Select the end date of the simulation

event.name: post
event.description: End of daily simulation time step

rule.name: Variable sowing rule
rule.condition: if (crop_in = 0) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then surface_moist = (sw(1) - ll15(1)) / (dul(1)- ll15(1)) if ((rain[[rain_days]] >= [rain_amount] AND esw >= [esw_amount] AND (surface_moist <= [surface_up] and surface_moist >= [surface_low])) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing] crop_in = 1 endif endif endif

property.name: rain_days
property.description: Enter number of days of rainfall (days):

property.name: surface_low
property.description: Enter lower limit of sw in top layer (0-1) (mm esw/mm soil) :

property.name: surface_up
property.description: Enter upper limit of sw in top layer (0-2) (mm esw/mm soil) :

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

rule.name: Sowing fertiliser
rule.condition: if ([fert_amount_sow] > 0) then fertiliz apply amount = [fert_amount_sow] (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type_sow] endif

property.name: modulename
property.description: On which module should the event come from :

property.name: eventname
property.description: On which event should fertiliser be applied :

property.name: fert_amount_sow
property.description: Amount of starter fertiliser at sowing (kg/ha) :

property.name: fert_type_sow
property.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea
